inscription:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [Juriaen Ovens]
life_date: Attributed to Jürgen Ovens, Danish (active in the Netherlands), 1623–1678
medium: Pen and black ink on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Mak van Waay, Amsterdam, June 9, 1975, no. 20, for fl.1,200 to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Entombment
